title: "Startup Awarded Contract for AI-Based Counter-Drone System"
excerpt: "Citadel Defense, a San Diego-based startup, recently received a multi-million dollar contract from the Pentagon for its artificial intelligence-based counter-unmanned aerial system technology. The military is facing a growing threat as adversaries develop and purchase inexpensive and potentially lethal drones."
